mapper.insert:
select route_seq.currval as routeId from dual
insert into route values(#{userId}, route_seq.nextval, #{routeName}, #{startLat}, #{startLng}, #{startAddress}, #{arriveLat}, #{arriveLng}, #{arriveAddress}, #{distance}, #{time})
mapper.select: select route_id, user_id, route_name, start_lat, start_lng, start_address, arrive_lat, arrive_lng, arrive_address, distance, time from route where route_id = #{routeId}

select r.route_id, r.user_id, r.route_name, r.start_lat, r.start_lng, r.start_address, r.arrive_lat, r.arrive_lng, r.arrive_address, r.distance, r.time, s.step_id, s.sroute_id, s.vmode, s.step_name, s.sstart_lat, s.sstart_lng, s.send_lat, s.send_lng, s.route_distance, s.route_time, s.seq, v.vehicle_id, v.vstep_id, v.vstart_lat, v.vstart_lng, v.vstart_name, v.vend_lat, v.vend_lng, v.vend_name, v.headsign, v.vehicle_name, v.vehicle_num, v.vehicle_move from route r left join step s on r.route_id=s.sroute_id left join vehicle v on s.step_id=v.vstep_id where user_id = #{userId}

select r.route_id, r.user_id, r.route_name, r.start_lat, r.start_lng, r.start_address, r.arrive_lat, r.arrive_lng, r.arrive_address, r.distance, r.time, s.step_id, s.sroute_id, s.vmode, s.step_name, s.sstart_lat, s.sstart_lng, s.send_lat, s.send_lng, s.route_distance, s.route_time, s.seq, v.vehicle_id, v.vstep_id, v.vstart_lat, v.vstart_lng, v.vstart_name, v.vend_lat, v.vend_lng, v.vend_name, v.headsign, v.vehicle_name, v.vehicle_num, v.vehicle_move from route r left join step s on r.route_id=s.sroute_id left join vehicle v on s.step_id=v.vstep_id where r.route_id= #{routeId}
